subject: Dear Mr. Kevin
body:
Dear Mr. Kevin,

It has been over 2 weeks since our last communications, and I was wondering
if you have decided not to work with me on this project? Like I
mentioned before, I am willing and capable to obtain all documents that
will legitimize this transaction.

What I need from you to claim this $23 million US Dollars is for you to be
sincere and work with me as my partner and I assure you of success. In the
meantime, please send me the following details;

(1) Your full Name.......
(2) home address......
(3) Telephone Number/ occupation for more information .
Regards

BARRISTER DAVID UBA. LLP
NATIONAL SECRETARIAT:NBA House,
Plot 1101 Mohammadu Buhari Way,
Central Business District,
Abuja F.C.T. Nigeria
